page.title: 11The Off-Licence, Otford.
page.content: The owner of the Off-Licence also owns a bigger one in Sevenoaks. He imports wine from Spain, France, Italy, and Germany. The shop is open from 10.30am. to 6.00pm, but is shut on Saturday and Wednesday afternoons. The owner and another person work in the shop. Alcohol is only sold to people who are 18 and over. The shop sells crisps, nuts, squash and tobacco, as well as all kinds of alcohol. We counted 175 wines, 35 beers, 14 sherries and 79 spirits. Most customers buy drink in the morning. Glasses are loaned when drinks are loaned for parties, etc. White wine is sold in the greatest quantities. Customers buy for parties and weddings as well as for drinking at home.
